bug.author: itssimon
bug.description:
Weights and Biases version: 0.9.1 Python version: 3.7 Operating System: Linux
<denchmark-code>import wandb
api = wandb.Api()
for run in api.runs(path='team/project'): print(run.id) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-code>--------------------------------------------------------------------------- TypeError Traceback (most recent call last) <ipython-input-3-5f6c7dfd3b29> in <module> 5 api = wandb.Api() 6 ----> 7 for run in api.runs(path='team/project'): 8 print(run.id)
~/.envs/clinex/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/apis/public.py in __next__(self) 521 self.index += 1 522 if len(self.objects) <= self.index: --> 523 if not self._load_page(): 524 raise StopIteration 525 if len(self.objects) <= self.index:
~/.envs/clinex/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/apis/public.py in _load_page(self) 509 self.last_response = self.client.execute( 510 self.QUERY, variable_values=self.variables) --> 511 self.objects.extend(self.convert_objects()) 512 return True 513
~/.envs/clinex/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/apis/public.py in convert_objects(self) 674 def convert_objects(self): 675 objs = [] --> 676 for run_response in self.last_response['project']['runs']['edges']: 677 run = Run(self.client, self.entity, self.project, run_response["node"]["name"], run_response["node"]) 678 objs.append(run)
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not subscriptable </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.96. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/itssimon>@itssimon</denchmark-link> we'll get a fix for the underlying bug, but wanted to let you know this means there are no runs for the given team/project that you're querying.
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vanpelt>@vanpelt</denchmark-link> . There definitely are runs. I've downgraded wandb to 0.8.36 and the runs are now showing.

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/itssimon>@itssimon</denchmark-link>
In the past few months we've majorly reworked the CLI and UI for Weights & Biases. We're closing stale issues. Please comment to reopen.
